content: My knowledge is limited to what has been published online. at the moment, the hirshhorn museum and sculpture garden has several special exhibitions on display, including "jimmie durham: at the center of the world," "rafael lozano-hemmer: pulse," and "roni horn: when i breathe, i draw (selected works 1969-2021)." i recommend checking the museum's official website frequently to keep up-to-date on any upcoming exhibitions or events.
